data.event: The population was 1,123 at the time of the 2000 census.
The first settlement began around 1794, after the end of the American Revolution.
Summit was created in 1819 from parts of the Towns of Jefferson and Cobleskill.

event.title: was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 2015

data.event: The House at 461 Spruce Lake Road was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 2015.
